'''Minecraft Where's the Zombie''' is a ''Minecraft'' activity book, centered around the search for a [[zombie]].

== Synopsis ==
{{Quote|"'''Spot the zombies and their variations lurking in these official Minecraft search-and-find scenes!'''

Did you hear that? A groan. There it goes again! But where is that pesky zombie?

Journey across the [[Dimension|dimensions]], spotting zombies and other mobs in ten incredible scenes and patterns.

Will you be able to spot them all before they find you?"}}
